title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not function properly. To resolve this, I need to first click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame for the tab key to start working correctly. This issue is observed on Windows 2000 operating system.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should allow me to navigate through the interactive elements on the page.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000 operating system. 
2. Try using the tab key to navigate through the interactive elements on the page. 
3. Observe that the tab key does not function properly. 
4. To resolve the issue, click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame. 
5. After clicking on an interactive area, try using the tab key again and verify that it now allows you to navigate through the interactive elements on the page.
